declarations.comments: Used for input from outside the game.
declarations.title: GameId

declarations.comments: Returns True if GameId is empty.
declarations.title: null

declarations.comments: Add a Game to the GameId.
declarations.title: runGameWithM

declarations.comments: Making Games at the Top Level.
declarations.title: runGameM

declarations.comments: Create a new child game within the current game.
declarations.title: runChildGameM

declarations.comments: Raise output to the parent game.
declarations.title: raise

declarations.comments:
Gets the current mouse position.
Returns Nothing if the mouse position cannot be obtained because the user has not moved the mouse yet.
declarations.title: getMousePosition

declarations.comments: Get the time since the current game was started.
declarations.title: getLocalTime

declarations.comments: Gets the current key press state.
declarations.title: getKeyState

declarations.comments: Get the time since the root game was started.
declarations.title: getGlobalTime

declarations.comments: Remove the handler from the emitter.
declarations.title: unregister

declarations.comments: Register a handler to the Emitter.
declarations.title: register

declarations.comments: The key that comes back when you register to the Emitter.
declarations.title: RegistrationId

declarations.comments: Used for input from outside the game.
declarations.title: GameId

declarations.comments: Returns True if GameId is empty.
declarations.title: null

declarations.comments: Take InternalRegistrationIds to detach the game from the process.
declarations.title: unregisterGame

declarations.comments: Disables the parent's transform, forcing it to draw from the origin. Heavy use is deprecated.
declarations.title: absolute

declarations.comments: Embeds the action of Aff into the Picture.
declarations.title: absorb

declarations.comments: It is not recommended to use this system except for the glapple system.
declarations.title: absorb'

declarations.comments:
Draw an arc with stroke.
Property angle is the rotation angle from the start position.
A positive number will cause a clockwise rotation, 2π will make a perfect circle, and 4π will return to a blank state.
declarations.title: arc

declarations.comments:
Draw a picture
It is not recommended to use this except for the glapple system.
declarations.title: drawPicture

declarations.comments: Retrieves the current transform state and draws a Picture.
declarations.title: drawWithTransform

declarations.comments:
Draw a fan.
Property angle is the rotation angle from the start position.
A positive number will cause a clockwise rotation, 2π will make a perfect circle, and 4π will return to a blank state.
declarations.title: fan

declarations.comments:
Combine images using the specified combining method.
Issue: Synthesis of the combined image behaves unexpectedly.
ex) x <-+ (y <-^ z) = (x <-+ y) <-^ z
declarations.title: composite

declarations.comments: Draws the sprite loaded by runGame.
declarations.title: sprite

declarations.comments: Create a new child game within the current game.
declarations.title: runChildGameM

declarations.comments: Making Games at the Top Level.
declarations.title: runGameM

declarations.title: runGameWithM

declarations.comments: Get the time since the root game was started.
declarations.title: getGlobalTime

declarations.comments: Get the time since the current game was started.
declarations.title: getLocalTime

declarations.comments: Raise output to the parent game.
declarations.title: raise

declarations.comments: Gets the current key press state.
declarations.title: getKeyState

declarations.comments:
Gets the current mouse position.
Returns Nothing if the mouse position cannot be obtained because the user has not moved the mouse yet.
declarations.title: getMousePosition

declarations.comments: Express the process of GlappleM by Effect.
declarations.title: toEffect
